text: Mahan dêipu meithâi atar inkhat, a riming Anna an ti, Asher rûia mi, Phanuel nâinupang a oma. kum sari vai inneiin a oma, kum sômriet minli meithâiin a oma2:36-37 kum sômriet minli meithâiin a oma; nônchu ama hah kum 84 tar ani.. Biekin mâk loiin a sûn a jânin bu ngêia Pathien Biekina, chubai thôn a om ngâia.
